column1: Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Simultaneous Action Selection

Basari is a game of gem merchants competing in a marketplace": racing, collecting, trading, and predicting what the other merchants will do.<br/><br/>To start the game, players receive 12 gemstones (3 each of 4 colors). <br/>Each turn there will be a movement phase and an action phase:<br/><br/>For movement, everyone simultaneously rolls their die and moves their markers around a track.<br/><br/>They then choose one of three different actions to perform. Basari: Das Kartenspiel, Edel, Stein & Reich
Components: Gems/Crystals, Misc: Mensa Select, Occupation: Merchant
